VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v_t_kondisi` AS select `t_kondisi`.`Id` AS `Id`,`t_kondisi`.`tgl` AS `tgl`,`t_kondisi`.`idbi` AS `idbi`,`t_kondisi`.`idbi_awal` AS `idbi_awal`,`t_kondisi`.`kond_awal` AS `kond_awal`,`t_kondisi`.`kond_akhir` AS `kond_akhir`,`t_kondisi`.`dif_kondisi` AS `dif_kondisi`,`t_kondisi`.`ket` AS `ket`,`t_kondisi`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`t_kondisi`.`uid` AS `uid`,`buku_induk`.`f` AS `f`,`buku_induk`.`g` AS `g`,`buku_induk`.`h` AS `h`,`buku_induk`.`i` AS `i`,`buku_induk`.`j` AS `j`,`buku_induk`.`c1` AS `c1`,`buku_induk`.`c` AS `c`,`buku_induk`.`d` AS `d`,`buku_induk`.`e` AS `e`,`buku_induk`.`e1` AS `e1`,`ref_barang`.`nm_barang` AS `nm_barang`,`buku_induk`.`noreg` AS `noreg`,`buku_induk`.`tahun` AS `tahun`,`buku_induk`.`thn_perolehan` AS `thn_perolehan`,`buku_induk`.`asal_usul` AS `asal_usul`,`buku_induk`.`jml_harga` AS `jml_harga`,`buku_induk`.`a1` AS `a1`,`buku_induk`.`a` AS `a`,`buku_induk`.`b` AS `b`,`buku_induk`.`f1` AS `f1`,`buku_induk`.`f2` AS `f2`,`t_kondisi`.`no_bast` AS `no_bast`,`t_kondisi`.`tgl_bast` AS `tgl_bast`,`t_kondisi`.`nilai_buku` AS `nilai_buku`,`t_kondisi`.`nilai_susut` AS `nilai_susut` from ((`t_kondisi` left join `buku_induk` on((`t_kondisi`.`idbi` = `buku_induk`.`id`))) left join `ref_barang` on(((`buku_induk`.`f` = `ref_barang`.`f`) and (`buku_induk`.`g` = `ref_barang`.`g`) and (`buku_induk`.`i` = `ref_barang`.`i`) and (`buku_induk`.`j` = `ref_barang`.`j`) and (`buku_induk`.`h` = `ref_barang`.`h`))))
